row1.description: Integrates with Honeywell PHD and OT systems for secure, scalable plant historian data ingestion.

row1.name: AWS
row1.description: Native integration with AWS services for cloud-scale storage, big data computation, and industrial OT analytics.

row1.description: Native integration with Azure for storage, streaming, and analytics on industrial and IIoT data.

row2.name: Oracle

row2.name: SQL Server
row2.description: Extracts and ingests business/process data from SQL Server for contextualization in DeepIQ.

row2.name: TimescaleDB
row2.description: Handles time-series data workloads, querying and ingesting into DeepIQ for scalable industrial analytics.

row2.name: Databricks
row2.description: Direct orchestration and integration with Databricks clusters in DeepIQ for ML and big data workflows.

row2.name: Snowflake
row2.description: Batch and streaming data ingestion into Snowflake for scalable, cloud-native industrial analytics in DeepIQ.

row3.name: SAP

row3.name: ServiceNow
row3.description: Bidirectional integration for OT/IT operations data and workflow automation in DeepIQ.
